analysis.description:
ERC20 (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#72-86) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#75-76)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#76-77)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#77)

Paypite (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#86-254) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#144-153)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#168-179)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#184-190)

Paypite.isLocked (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#228-231) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- releaseTimes[_spender] == 0 || releaseTimes[_spender] <= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#229-231)

Paypite._decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#87-89)
Paypite._name should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#91)
Paypite._symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#91-93)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_multisig' of Paypite.Paypite (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#135) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newTradableState' of Paypite.setTradable (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#207) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of Paypite.isLocked (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#228) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_agent' of Paypite.setMigrationAgent (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#240-241) is not in mixedCase
Paypite.decimalMultiplier (/unique_chucks/10/0x0ff161071e627a0e6de138105c73970f86ca7922.sol#89-91) is never used in Paypite
